about_the_game:
Step into the legend of Erandique, a fearless indigenous warrior fighting for his people’s survival in a world filled with myths and challenges.

The conquerors have arrived on the shores, threatening to destroy everything in their path. Creatures from folklore emerge from the jungle, testing your courage at every turn. To save your people, you must travel across vast lands, exploring ancient villages and facing powerful enemies in thrilling combat.

Each mission takes you further, unveiling hidden secrets in a world inspired by the rich history and culture of Central America.

Key Features

🗺️ Explore a living world – Journey through indigenous villages, uncover their stories, and face lurking dangers.

⚔️ Dynamic combat – Master the axe and bow to battle conquerors and mythical beasts in intense encounters.
🎯 Quests and progression – Interact with villagers to receive tasks that unlock new regions of the map.
🎶 Immersive soundtrack – Enjoy an original score composed with traditional indigenous instruments.
detailed_description:
Step into the legend of Erandique, a fearless indigenous warrior fighting for his people’s survival in a world filled with myths and challenges.

The conquerors have arrived on the shores, threatening to destroy everything in their path. Creatures from folklore emerge from the jungle, testing your courage at every turn. To save your people, you must travel across vast lands, exploring ancient villages and facing powerful enemies in thrilling combat.

Each mission takes you further, unveiling hidden secrets in a world inspired by the rich history and culture of Central America.

Key Features

🗺️ Explore a living world – Journey through indigenous villages, uncover their stories, and face lurking dangers.

⚔️ Dynamic combat – Master the axe and bow to battle conquerors and mythical beasts in intense encounters.
🎯 Quests and progression – Interact with villagers to receive tasks that unlock new regions of the map.
🎶 Immersive soundtrack – Enjoy an original score composed with traditional indigenous instruments.
name: Erandique

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10, macOS 10.12+, or a compatible Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent (2.0 GHz+)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics or equivalent).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, macOS 10.14+, or an optimized Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent (2.5 GHz+)
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High-quality stereo or surround sound system
